content: this legal text is about a divorce case between two individuals referred to as 1txxx rep 2xx and xxx us the document outlines the progress of the case starting with preliminary information such as their belgian nationality and the fact that they have been living apart for six months it then details the settlement of their rights including the division of property liabilities and care of their children the document also addresses financial matters such as maintenance payments and tax benefits it concludes by stating that the agreements made will have retroactive effect and will be binding upon the parties the text also mentions the acceptance of an ons agreement the confirmation of identities by a notary and the parties declaration of their ability to enter into the agreement it further explains the process of executing the deed the rights and obligations of the parties and the custody of the original deed by the notary the text also mentions the availability of the deed online and the probative value of the signed copy finally it mentions that a notary named xx has received a draft of amendments related to the organic law notarial profession which have been acknowledged and signed by the parties involved
